message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you first. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,600,000 is fair. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only offer $1,400,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,400,000 is too low for me to consider.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $1,500,000?
Alice, I understand your position, but given my budget constraints, I can't go above $1,450,000. I hope this might be closer to what you're looking for.
